pages.title: Bluntnose Sixgill Shark
pages.text: The bluntnose sixgill shark ($(o)Hexanchus griseus$()), often simply called the cow shark, is the largest hexanchoid shark, growing to 20 ft ($(o)6.1 m$()) in length.$(br2)It is found in tropical and temperate waters worldwide and its diet is widely varied by region.

pages.title: Bluntnose Sixgill Shark
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★★☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 3$(br2)Growth time: 7 Days
